1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Content operators.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Arith
7  ( copsArith
8    -- $Operators
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base        as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data        as D
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Message as Msg
14
15
16
17-- ----------------------
18-- $Operators
19--
20--  [@+@]     Addition.
21--
22--  [@-@]     Subtruction.
23--
24--  [@*@]     Multipication.
25--
26--  [@quo@]   Quotient.
27--
28--  [@rem@]   Remainder.
29--
30--  [@abs@]   Absolute value.
31--
32
33copsArith :: (D.CContent c) => [D.Cop c]
34copsArith =
35    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copPrefix "+")          copPlus1
36    , D.CopCalc  (D.copPrefix "-")          copMinus1
37
38    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "abs")        copAbs
39    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "int-part")   copIntPart
40    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "frac-part")  copFracPart
41
42    -- ----------------------  fractional
43
44    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round")           copRound
45    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-at")        copRoundAt
46    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-per")       copRoundPer
47
48    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-even")      copRoundEven
49    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-even-at")   copRoundEvenAt
50    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-even-per")  copRoundEvenPer
51
52    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-in")        copRoundIn
53    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-in-at")     copRoundInAt
54    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-in-per")    copRoundInPer
55
56    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-out")       copRoundOut
57    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-out-at")    copRoundOutAt
58    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-out-per")   copRoundOutPer
59
60    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-down")      copRoundDown
61    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-down-at")   copRoundDownAt
62    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-down-per")  copRoundDownPer
63
64    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-up")        copRoundUp
65    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-up-at")     copRoundUpAt
66    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "round-up-per")    copRoundUpPer
67
68    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "trunc")           copRoundIn
69    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "trunc-at")        copRoundInAt
70    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "trunc-per")       copRoundInPer
71    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "trunc-error")     copTruncError
72
73    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "floor")           copRoundDown
74    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "floor-at")        copRoundDownAt
75    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "floor-per")       copRoundDownPer
76
77    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "ceil")            copRoundUp
78    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "ceil-at")         copRoundUpAt
79    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "ceil-per")        copRoundUpPer
80
81    -- ----------------------  add and subtract
82
83    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "+")    $ copPlus2 D.FracleLong
84    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  ".+")   $ copPlus2 D.FracleLeft
85    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "+.")   $ copPlus2 D.FracleRight
86    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  ".+.")  $ copPlus2 D.FracleStrict
87
88    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "+")    $ copPlus D.FracleLong
89    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal ".+")   $ copPlus D.FracleLeft
90    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "+.")   $ copPlus D.FracleRight
91    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal ".+.")  $ copPlus D.FracleStrict
92
93    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "-")    $ copMinus2 D.FracleLong
94    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  ".-")   $ copMinus2 D.FracleLeft
95    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "-.")   $ copMinus2 D.FracleRight
96    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  ".-.")  $ copMinus2 D.FracleStrict
97
98    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "-")    $ copMinus2 D.FracleLong
99    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal ".-")   $ copMinus2 D.FracleLeft
100    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "-.")   $ copMinus2 D.FracleRight
101    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal ".-.")  $ copMinus2 D.FracleStrict
102
103    -- ----------------------  multiply and divide
104
105    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "*")      copMul
106    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "*")      copMul
107
108    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "div")    copDiv
109    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "quo")    copQuo
110    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix  "rem")    copRem
111
112    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "recip")  copRecip
113    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "div")    copDiv
114    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "quo")    copQuo
115    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "rem")    copRem
116    ]
117
118
119copDec :: (Show c, D.CText c, D.CDec c) => B.Ab c -> B.Ab D.Decimal
120copDec (Right c) | D.isDec  c = Right $ D.gDec c
121                 | D.isText c = D.decodeDecimal $ D.gText c
122copDec x = Msg.notNumber (show x)
123
124getDecFrom :: (D.CDec c, D.CText c) => c -> B.Ab D.Decimal
125getDecFrom c | D.isDec  c  = Right $ D.gDec c
126             | D.isText c  = D.decodeDecimal $ D.gText c
127             | otherwise   = Right 0
128
129getDec1 :: (D.CDec c, D.CText c) => [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab D.Decimal
130getDec1 arg =
131    do x' <- D.getRightArg1 arg
132       getDecFrom x'
133
134getDec2 :: (D.CDec c, D.CText c) => [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab (D.Decimal, D.Decimal)
135getDec2 arg =
136    do (x', y') <- D.getRightArg2 arg
137       x <- getDecFrom x'
138       y <- getDecFrom y'
139       Right (x, y)
140
141copIntPart :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
142copIntPart arg =
143    do a <- getDec1 arg
144       D.putDec $ D.decimalIntPart a
145
146copFracPart :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
147copFracPart arg =
148    do a <- getDec1 arg
149       D.putDec $ D.decimalFracPart a
150
151copAbs :: (D.CList c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
152copAbs [Right c] | D.isList c = Right . D.pList =<< mapM copAbs1 (D.gList c)
153                 | otherwise  = copAbs1 c
154copAbs _ = Msg.unexpAttr "abs"
155
156copAbs1 :: (D.CDec c) => B.AbMap c
157copAbs1 c | D.isDec c = D.putDec $ abs $ D.gDec c
158copAbs1 _ = Msg.unexpAttr "abc"
159
160copRound         :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
161copRoundAt       :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
162copRoundPer      :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
163
164copRoundEven     :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
165copRoundEvenAt   :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
166copRoundEvenPer  :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
167
168copRoundIn       :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
169copRoundInAt     :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
170copRoundInPer    :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
171copTruncError    :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
172
173copRoundOut      :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
174copRoundOutAt    :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
175copRoundOutPer   :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
176
177copRoundDown     :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
178copRoundDownAt   :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
179copRoundDownPer  :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
180
181copRoundUp       :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
182copRoundUpAt     :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
183copRoundUpPer    :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
184
185copRound         = round1 D.decimalRound
186copRoundAt       = round2 D.decimalRoundAt
187copRoundPer      = round2 D.decimalRoundPer
188
189copRoundEven     = round1 D.decimalRoundEven
190copRoundEvenAt   = round2 D.decimalRoundEvenAt
191copRoundEvenPer  = round2 D.decimalRoundEvenPer
192
193copRoundIn       = round1 D.decimalTrunc
194copRoundInAt     = round2 D.decimalTruncAt
195copRoundInPer    = round2 D.decimalTruncPer
196copTruncError    = round1 D.decimalTruncError
197
198copRoundOut      = round1 D.decimalRoundOut
199copRoundOutAt    = round2 D.decimalRoundOutAt
200copRoundOutPer   = round2 D.decimalRoundOutPer
201
202copRoundDown     = round1 D.decimalFloor
203copRoundDownAt   = round2 D.decimalFloorAt
204copRoundDownPer  = round2 D.decimalFloorPer
205
206copRoundUp       = round1 D.decimalCeil
207copRoundUpAt     = round2 D.decimalCeilAt
208copRoundUpPer    = round2 D.decimalCeilPer
209
210round1 :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => B.Map D.Decimal -> [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab c
211round1 f arg = 
212    do dec <- getDec1 arg
213       D.putDec $ f dec
214
215round2 :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => B.Bin D.Decimal -> [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab c
216round2 f arg = 
217    do (per, dec) <- getDec2 arg
218       D.putDec $ f per dec
219
220-- --------------------------------------------  Add and subtract
221
222copPlus :: (Show c, D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.FracleSide -> D.CopCalc c
223copPlus pr xs = fmap D.pDec $ loop xs where
224    loop [] = Right 0
225    loop (n : m) = do n' <- copDec n
226                      m' <- loop m
227                      (D.decimalAdd pr) n' m'
228
229copPlus2 :: (D.CDec c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c) => D.FracleSide -> D.CopCalc c
230copPlus2 pr [Right xc, Right yc]
231    | D.isDec   xc && D.isDec   yc = D.putDec   =<< D.decimalAdd pr  (D.gDec   xc) (D.gDec   yc)
232    | D.isClock xc && D.isClock yc = D.putClock =<< D.clockAdd       (D.gClock xc) (D.gClock yc)
233    | D.isTime  xc && D.isClock yc = D.putTime  =<< D.timeAddClock   (D.gClock yc) (D.gTime  xc) 
234    | D.isClock xc && D.isTime  yc = D.putTime  =<< D.timeAddClock   (D.gClock xc) (D.gTime  yc)
235copPlus2 _ _ = Msg.unexpAttr "+"
236
237copPlus1 :: (D.CDec c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c) => D.CopCalc c
238copPlus1 [Right x] | D.isDec x = Right x
239copPlus1 _ = Msg.unexpAttr "+"
240
241
242-- --------------------------------------------  Multiply and divide
243
244copMul :: (Show c, D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
245copMul xs = fmap D.pDec $ loop xs where
246    loop [] = Right 1
247    loop (n : m) = do n' <- copDec n
248                      m' <- loop m
249                      D.decimalMul n' m'
250
251copMinus2 :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c) => D.FracleSide -> D.CopCalc c
252copMinus2 pr [Right xc, Right yc]
253    | D.isDec   xc && D.isDec   yc = D.putDec   =<< D.decimalSub pr (D.gDec   xc) (D.gDec   yc)
254    | D.isClock xc && D.isClock yc = D.putClock =<< D.clockSub      (D.gClock xc) (D.gClock yc)
255    | D.isTime  xc && D.isTime  yc = D.putClock =<< D.timeDiff      (D.gTime  xc) (D.gTime  yc)
256copMinus2 _ _ = Msg.unexpAttr "-"
257
258copMinus1 :: (D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
259copMinus1 [Right x] | D.isDec x = D.putDec $ negate $ D.gDec x
260copMinus1 _ = Msg.unexpAttr "-"
261
262copRecip :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
263copRecip arg =
264    do a <- getDec1 arg
265       D.putDec $ recip a
266
267copDiv :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
268copDiv arg =
269    do (a, b) <- getDec2 arg
270       D.putDec $ a / b
271
272copQuo :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
273copQuo arg =
274    do (a, b) <- getDec2 arg
275       c <- D.decimalQuo a b
276       D.putDec c
277
278copRem :: (D.CText c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
279copRem arg =
280    do (a, b) <- getDec2 arg
281       c <- D.decimalRem a b
282       D.putDec c
283
